website_summaries.verdict: Tops its competitors w/solid construction, mid-range price, compelling features, and lengthy warranty. The best available.
pros: A rugged table that's built to last
Solid plastic top with UV protection and 18-gauge steel frame capable of holding 1,000 lbs
cons: Dirt and stains require effort to clean off the textured surface, but this isn't a major issue

customer_reviews.title: This 1000 lb. capacity table sags under the weight of 20 lb. sewing machine.
customer_reviews.text: This table is rated for 1000 lbs. I bought the table for use as a sewing table, and the top is sagging beneath the weight of a 20 lb. sewing machine. When I place a straight edge across the 29 1/2" width of the table, the gap is a 1/2" dip. Not a flat surface, if that is what you're after. You are not able to return table after 30 days, so if sagging develops over time, too bad, you own the table.
customer_reviews.author: CreativeFolk

customer_reviews.title: there are better tables. It was cheap and it works
customer_reviews.text: 1000lbs my fanny, this thing is sinking in the middle because of a 70lb plasma tv sitting on the edge, making the tv lean downward. If the weight was evenly distributed, this table might hold a few hundred pounds, but in real world conditions where you want to use it for a computer desk or set anything heavy and compact on it, there are better tables. It was cheap and it works, therefore three stars.
customer_reviews.author: J. Peshek

customer_reviews.title: Premium multi-purpose table
customer_reviews.text: This table is big enough to hold (2) 22" tv monitors, 1 desktop tower, and 2 17" laptops, with room to spare to work on and build computers. The plastic is good quality plastic and not cheap, holds up alot of weight and legs are super sturdy and strong. The table doesnt wobble, it's very stable, theres alot of leg room underneath if you wanna store bins underneath or stretch your legs out. Table is high enough to where if a basement flooded it'd be ok, it to me is pretty high off the floor. On the same side of the table, you can seat about almost 3 people sitting in chairs. Hope this review helps.
customer_reviews.author: Zali

customer_reviews.title: Table Sags Drastically
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this table for our son to use as a computer desk. With a 1000lb capacity, that shouldn't be a problem right? Unfortunately this table sags very drastically toward the center. To the point that it's worthless as a desk now. Anything requiring a flat surface is out, as it wobbles around the sink hole that the tabletop has become. The sagging wasn't evident at first sight and became worse over time, but a 1000lb capacity, steel framed table should last much longer and certainly shouldn't just start sagging or what's the point? Would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendee Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: The best home work table ever
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with this table. I am using it as a sewing table. It has enough space to hold whatever I am sewing plus supplies to the right or left. Of course you could use it for just about any project. It is not so heavy that it is a burden to move. It is an nice light grey color and actually looks good in my home. I have used it as a basis for color in my work room. (pink, grey, red (accent), black). If you want more space be sure to order two, as the price can't be beat for the quality you get.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Lanoue

customer_reviews.title: Seriously tough table
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this table. I use this as a desktop table for my office on which sits my Alienware Aurora ALX R4 tower, my 24inch monitor, my oversize mouse pad, and my keyboard. The table is strong enough to not even flex if I lean in the middle of it during intense gaming. It says 1000lb capacity and the table definitely seems like it could hold it too. All in all, I like the table and would recommend it to anyone needing a very large, very strong table that will likely outlast the purchaser.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D

customer_reviews.title: Decent Utility Type Table
customer_reviews.text: Arrived sooner than expected. It has two areas with slight damage. About a three inch long raised bump along one side and a I caught my finger on a sharp splinter of plastic on the opposite edge. Packaging was in good shape so not sure how that happened. I sanded the splinter down because I just plan to use it as a utility table in the garage. It is heavy and awkward to handle in this 8 foot long size so not worth trying to repackage it to send back. For the price and free shipping it works fine for me.
customer_reviews.author: Miss P

customer_reviews.title: Probably best for "occational' light use only.
customer_reviews.text: This table is "just fine", but in my opinion needs more support. I'm using my table as a make shift desk. My monitor and laptop provide enough weight that after 2 months my table was drooping in the middle. The table legs are sturdy, and the table does not rock. The metal legs and connections are solid. If only they had used one or two more metal rods to support the middle of the table to keep it flat. I am now working on a concave table.
customer_reviews.author: jay3cf

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light
customer_reviews.text: Part of my job is setting up tables for luncheons. I bought two of these and may buy more. They are very sturdy and very light and very easy on my back. The blow-molded design is why the table surface is so strong and light. The design has a honeycomb structure that gives it a lot of strength. One downside - being plastic, you can't put hot things directly on the table.
customer_reviews.author: C. Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: There's Room for Improvement
customer_reviews.text: The GOOD: This table is very study, as advertised. I love that about it. I've had stacks and stacks of heavy books on it for 2 weeks and there's no sagging whatsoever. The BAD: The measurements are off. The table is a little smaller than the stated dimensions. Also, of the three I ordered, two had major dents in the edges of the molded plastic top. The only reason I didn't send them back is because I planned to cover them with tablecloths so no one will see the dents.
customer_reviews.author: Fisher Miles

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value for a strong sturdy table with a well placed handle on the underside for loading & unloading it in my Truck
customer_reviews.text: I am a Knife Sharpener & Maker.. I set up one of my Knife making belt grinders on a table at my local Farmer's Market every Sunday.. The Plastic table I had before only lasted 3 years and a few Months and it costs about Twice as much.. This NPS Table is Sturdy and I should get many years of service out of.. Has a well thought out handle on the under side that really helps with loading it and unloading....
customer_reviews.author: Rhino Knives

customer_reviews.title: Good heavy-duty folding table
customer_reviews.text: Very solid tables, these are like the kind I used to get from Cosco a decade or two ago (and maybe are still available there--I think the brand was Lifetime). These are pretty much identical, maybe even a notch above actually because the table-top is a bit smoother. The older Lifetime tables sometimes give me a kind of fiberglass-burn when I rest/rub my arms on them, and these are nicer than that. Pricey I think, but worth the extra bucks. Level and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Saccenti

customer_reviews.title: It's a crap shoot.
customer_reviews.text: Oh well ! These tables seem to get minor damage or really small dents on the sides from shipping or maybe mishandling. I bought four 48" tables and one 60" table and all have dings but not from me !!! Although the longer table did state something about a minor ding, that was an understatement !!!! Still for my use, it did not matter that much. You might get lucky and receive one that is perfect. Just too bulky for shipping or previous handling. All said, still very useable for me.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Noble

customer_reviews.title: Well Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this item. Fit and finish are great. This 66 year old can easily move it around, fold/unfold the legs, etc. Not sure I'd place a piano on top of it but it easily holds my desktop computer and monitor, Brother laser printer/scanner, speakers AND a ham radio station (IC 7300, 30 amp switching supply and ALS 600 amplifier with linear power supply on the floor). We knew it would be a squeeze getting my computer and radio gear into this small bedroom while leaving it open for any guest couples that might visit. This table has delivered more storage and convenience than anticipated. Very well satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: William J. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good, but needs better packaging...
customer_reviews.text: Good solid table for the price, but it arrived damaged on the end and two of the corners. The packing around it just covered the table with cardboard and had no other interior packaging to prevent damage in shipping. Might be good for retail but not mail order shipping. I will always cover the table so I kept it, but the damage is really unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: DaveO

customer_reviews.title: Very solid
customer_reviews.text: Really well made overall. They even come with a little link to stop the legs from collapsing accidentally while open; most don't. They're made of very sturdy materials. Note: After a lot of use they have started to sag some in the middle, it doesn't seem to effect durability but they're no longer perfectly level. I'll look into reinforcing them with a 2"x4" or similar. The sag has became the bane of my existence, despite their durability (which I CAN attest to) I'm completely unable to level the surface which makes using them for a multi-monitor setup entirely impossible. The middle is a good 1.5" lower than either side.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Joke

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: More table than you could ever want. Very sturdy and durable. Truly portable and able to withstand multiple break down/set ups per day for years. You can literally jump up and down on this table when assembled. Its that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: CHIRPER

customer_reviews.title: (Also makes a good staging area for getting out Christmas decorations
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted to fold clothes on in the garage where my washer and dryer are located. (Also makes a good staging area for getting out Christmas decorations, gift wrapping, etc) I had already purchased and returned two tables to Home Depot. I purchased a 4 foot table (too short) and a 6 foot table (too long) and they do not carry a 5 footer which is perfect for my space in the garage. Also, the two tables from Home Depot were fold in half tables and they were not sturdy. This table arrived postage free within days of my order!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Parker

customer_reviews.title: very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and heavy also. I can't move it by myself. It packs away very nicely. But at the same time, it is too big to be moved in a regular car...
customer_reviews.author: Ning

customer_reviews.title: We love both of ours!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these tables for holidays primarily. But, they were quickly repurposed as permanent fixtures. They are computer tables now, and fit the bill perfectly! They are extremely durable and strong. All of our computer accessories, including printer, laminator, and photo printer fit with plenty of room to work! One of our best purchases to date!
customer_reviews.author: JohnW

customer_reviews.title: poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table overall and undoubtedly better than a cheap laminated particle board one, and even less expensive. But mine came via UPS with two dents in the "virtually indestructible" top, because something very heavy and fairly sharp was placed on top of it, crushing and tearing the cardboard packing, as well. Based on my experience with plastic resin chairs and tables, I would say that altho it is made of " premium polyethylene" according to the box, it is not so much the patio chair, but more the milk jug type.
customer_reviews.author: be serious

customer_reviews.title: Very well built
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our church for the different events we hold. We got rid of the old heavy wood ones and we were concerned they would be too cheap or flimsy; I'm happy to say that this brand is MUCH better than some of the brands you see other places. I would highly recommend these to anyone! TJH
customer_reviews.author: Tim H.

customer_reviews.title: The 1000 pound Wight capacity limit is over stated good light duty table.
customer_reviews.text: I received the table today and wanted to express my impressions of this product. First the packaging is not durable, the shipping box needs to be improved, the manufacture also has a very high opinion of the the virtually indestructible top, the one I received has an impression on one Conner. Either caused before it was shipped or during shipping, however I can live with it. The 1000 pound Wight capacity limit is over stated, I am not sure how much this table will support; but I would be cautious. My overall impression is that it is a good light duty table the middle is soft.
customer_reviews.author: frind

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Table but one downside
customer_reviews.text: I got this table and there are dark little spots all over it and I tried scrubbing it down but they still wouldn't come off. Besides that it makes for a great sturdy desk. Fits a 27' monitor and a 24' and I think I can fit one more 24' if I get creative with the angles.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Heston

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdier than most I have seen and felt. I was reluctant to buy online, because normally a table has to be touched and examined closely. No two tables are perfectly level. This may be a problem for computer equipment, especially if you are joining two tables together. They seem just as good as the Samsonite brand, and I have 2 of those.
customer_reviews.author: JapillaTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great table!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this table which I received in perfect condition. There were heavy plastic pieces protecting the corners which I appreciated and will keep for storing/transporting to and from markets. There were no scratches or blemishes and it appears very sturdy. I plan on purchasing 2 more from this vendor. Shipping was faster than I expected also.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Willis

customer_reviews.title: Table is sturdy and durable
customer_reviews.text: Table is sturdy and durable. It can be used to put anything you wish on it, within reason. Items which I have had on my table: Coffee maker, Printer, Computer Monitors, Speakers, Champagne bottle, champagne glasses, eye glasses, wrist watch, coffee cup (filled), paper money, coins, paper clips, rubber bands, multitude of pens, legal pads, letter tray, envelopes, checkbook, wallet, stamps, hard wired phone, cell phone(s), bobble heads, miniature presidential busts, date planner, calendar, keys, gift cards, business cards, greeting cards, thank you cards, christmas cards, thank you notes, cigarettes, ash tray, lighter, vhs tapes, dvds, blu rays, blu ray player, vhs player, television. Highly recommend if you own any of the aforementioned items.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Solid Table
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this table through Amazon kind of last minute for a 4th of July party. The table is very solid and appears superior to what was available and in-stock locally. We used this as an outdoor serving table at our gathering and it performed perfectly. I would expect that we will get many years of use out of it. Although the legs fold away for storage, this in no way detracts from the rigidity of the table. This is definitely a 5-star product and it was delivered on time and in good condition. Additionally, I do not believe the product page lists the country of origin, but for anyone interested, this table is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua M

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for commercial use. Nice and sturdy, the top is rigid enough for 6 adults to comfortably work on (3 each side) while writing / drawing. The only problem we've had is with the locking mechanism underneath; there are two rings that slide down; one on each of the fold-down arms. Curious kids like to get under the table and mess with the rings, often leaving them in the unlocked location. We covered them with tape to stop this happening.
customer_reviews.author: Anneoneamouse

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy table. Only the legs fold; the actual table is one solid piece. The plastic surface makes cleanup easy. It weighs 35#. I feel my money was well spent. The seller provided a speedy delivery. The table arrived undamaged. I strongly recommend it. UPDATE 10/27/2017 actual table top has no internal support and is now caving in under the weight of 10 six inch potted plants.
customer_reviews.author: E. E. Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Slagged in middle after 1 year
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these over a year ago to use as a table to build model aircraft and boats and both tables became useless because the center of the tables saged. It is a noticeable sag too. The middle of the table (Centerline) is about 1/2" lower than the edges I had to buy a sheet of 1" inch plywood to lay on top of them get a flat surface again.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: very strong relatively light weight utility tables.
customer_reviews.text: i recommend these very strong relatively light weight utility tables. The legs are steel with a simple steel ring to lock the legs in the extended position. The top is a laminate shell reinforced on the bottom surface with a ridged thick foam material. The result is a low cost efficient design. I used them as work tables in my shop. They worked well. Amazon prime shined again. They were delivered two days after ordered at my front door. The tables are large enough that transporting them with an ordinary car is tough without a roof rack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good choice for computer workspace alternative.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as an alternative to a legitimate computer desk. Prices are outrageous and this was the perfect solution. It was cheap enough that I could afford it, small enough to fit snugly into a corner of my studio apartment, and large enough to fit two monitors and a tower, along with some other junk. I also use it to eat meals on, like a regular kitchen table. So it's great if you're poor and/or living in a small space..and if you spend most of your time in front of computers wasting your life. My only complaint would be that it sort of sags in the middle, but not so much that it causes a distraction or is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: theheatison76

customer_reviews.title: As expected out of the box...
customer_reviews.text: Received yesterday. Undamaged, set up easily, surface is flat and feels sturdy even on carpeted flooring, it’s holding 2 small sewing machines without sag. Will update after using it for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: WINTERFARM

customer_reviews.title: Well made table!
customer_reviews.text: Well made table! second UPDATE:t: 9/19/2016......Have used these under relatively rough conditions and they still seem to hold up well!! A definite BUY! UPDATE: Several antique shows at Brimfield, MA. later,... and they are still holding up very well! Trust me, we are not easy on these by any means and are impressed how well they are made! Pretty impressive build quality and as a retired mechanical engineer,... merely ONE of the reasons I hate needing China! LOL! Folks, I spend a lot of time, energy and MONEY testing and reviewing stuff that I buy here on Amazon, so if this was helpful, please CLICK! Thx.
customer_reviews.author: Audiophile MB (Marco B.-NYC)

customer_reviews.title: Definitely nice that they're so sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Stout, able to handle a lot of weight, and decent looking. I was originally torn between these and the type that fold in the center, for ease of transporting and storage. I don't regret going this route, as they don't really take up any extra space to store up against a wall, and I've actually stood on them several times already working on projects around the house. Definitely nice that they're so sturdy, if you don't have to transport your tables in a small car these are the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Ronaldus Magnus

customer_reviews.title: sturdy table, iffy quality control
customer_reviews.text: We bought this table for crafting on, tracing patterns, cutting patterns, and for that it is working really well. The table is sturdy and easily folds open and closed. It's not to heavy and I can wrestle it out of the closet and set it up myself. The package looked fine, however there is a smooshed in spot about 2 inches long on one end. I debated sending it back but it doesn't interfere with the integrity of the table, however, it's still one star off.
customer_reviews.author: Becky at the beach

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Table Space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to provide more space to work on various projects. The table sits at a comfortable height and is very sturdy. The product was packaged just as you would assume; in a large, flat, rectangular box. I currently have a large plywood box, ~40lbs, and it has no visible deflection or bending. The color is the run-of-the-mill white/ash speckled pattern, which is exactly what I would want for a folding table. I could easily see myself buying another- if I had more space in my project room for it. But for what I needed, this was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work for Intended Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Better suited as a banquet or display table where level surface is not prime concern. Purchased for 3, 24" monitors to be displayed side by side for use in home office. After 2 months noticed a 1/4" sag on center monitor. Surface not suitable for use with optic mouse either. However, very stable even when used as a free-standing table.
customer_reviews.author: John Glick

customer_reviews.title: I could place a piece of thick paper under whatever I am writing on and it would work out fine. The table is also light enough f
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant on purchasing this table since I needed one with a smooth top for drawing/writing and the reviews were iffy on how smooth the top was. The top is smooth enough for me to write on, and if I needed it any smoother, I could place a piece of thick paper under whatever I am writing on and it would work out fine. The table is also light enough for me to fold up and store in the closet, which I was also worried about.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Value from Amazon Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this used from the warehouse, in Good condition at a discount. It is awesome. Sturdy enough for me to use as a workbench to reglaze, and repair my wooden storm windows. The cosmetic flaw was minor, as described by the warehouse. It could be used as seating with a table cloth for guests during the holidays. It does not fold in half for storage but the legs fold up and the table would store flat. I think the fact that it does not fold is one reason that it is so substantial.
customer_reviews.author: Bliss Grey

customer_reviews.title: Good Table, Marginal Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table because it looked a bit more heavy duty than the typical folding plastic table. To that end, the frame is very solid, with 16 gauge boxed steel sections along the sides and thick tubular legs, I have no reason to doubt its 1000 lb distributed load claim. It sole weakness seems to be the thin blow-molded plastic top that doesn't stand up to much in the way of impact or point loads. The packaging is very light and does not absorb much abuse, and my table arrived with a small tear in the box revealing a large dent in the table top.
customer_reviews.author: Aeliopic

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and exceptional product
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a table for his computer screens (he has two 32 inch screens) that could also hold his tower. His Game Center is in our basement, so I thought one of these tables would be the best choice over trying to get a desk down there. This is a VERY sturdy product. Definitely a worthwhile purchase! If you need a folding table for anything, seriously go with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Good solid Table.
customer_reviews.text: There is some minorsurface warp not noticeable to eye. When using a apple keyboard it would not stay flat against the surface. AA or AAA batteries will roll till the reach a dip.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: Great multipurpose table
customer_reviews.text: Great multipurpose table! This is the 2nd one of these I've bought, and have owned the first one for over a year now. Extremely light and portable (for a large table), and solidly built enough to handle any light to medium loads. Easy to set up and take down as needed, and include a handle on the underside in the middle of the steel frame for easier carrying. Both I've received have had very minor surface defects that I suspect are a byproduct of the manufacturing process, but do not impact the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander T. Clark

customer_reviews.title: still looks pretty new and its been almost 2
customer_reviews.text: versatile and cheap!! I've used this as a desk, dinning room table, beer pong table, tv stand, and out door patio furniture. still looks pretty new and its been almost 2.5 years! sturdy, reliable, easy to clean. Literally cannot beat this.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Right Size
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. It is the size I was looking for (5ft x 2.5ft, or 60x30 inches). In all of the big box stores around here I can only find six-foot tables or five-foot tables only two-foot wide. It is sturdy (at least for my purposes). It flattens easily and stores in a small area. Very, very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Payne

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this table about a year ago. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this table about a year ago. It is serving its intended purpose, and I have no complaints. If you need or want additional weight capacity, consider this product also available from Amazon: Lifetime Products 80249 Professional Folding Table, 6', Almond.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and well built
customer_reviews.text: I use these for catering parties. I don't like the little bendable ones at all. Both the 6' and 8' are just great. Clean up easily. Should be a no-brainer, but DONT put hot pans on this tables!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Safford

customer_reviews.title: Great to use as a desk
customer_reviews.text: This makes an excellent work desk for home. Sturdy and well made - the top is light gray with black speckles. It is attractive for a utilitarian table. No assembly required. Just pop it out of the box and unfold the legs. You can easily sit six adults at this table if you needed extra dinner seating as well.
customer_reviews.author: MARMich

customer_reviews.title: Sags in the middle
customer_reviews.text: A computer and a few monitors caused a permanent sag in the middle of the table. The frame is solid but the table top seems to be just hollow plastic. The center of the table will slowly deform and sink a quarter to half inch. Still usable for some applications but not if you need something flat across the entire surface.
customer_reviews.author: NotMyName

customer_reviews.title: Won't find them cheaper anywhere else..
customer_reviews.text: Order this for my daughter as a Christmas present. We needed some heavy duty tables to set her aquariums on and these are perfect! She has the coolest room in the house! I priced these tables everywhere, local and online and this was by far the best price out there. Not to mention the weight capacity outranks them all. Before we took them up to her room I even used one to serve family during Christmas. And all around great product!
customer_reviews.author: J.A.K

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This table is very sturdy and strong. What an improvement over the melamine tables I used to buy! I'm quite happy with this product and intend to purchase a second one soon. I can sit two people to a side and, amazingly, the supports underneath the table on either end do not get in the way; our knees are happy. Not terribly attractive but a table cloth will allow me to feel comfortable entertaining dinner guests.
customer_reviews.author: Blackbearfamily

customer_reviews.title: It is incredibly sturdy, affordable and so easy to store
customer_reviews.text: This table is so handy and versatile. We use it for so many different things. It is incredibly sturdy, affordable and so easy to store. It folds flat and there are clips that hold the legs flat against the underside of the table. You can easily slide this under a bed. You will be happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: T. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Sagging in the middle.
customer_reviews.text: Originally gave this table 5 stars..... We purchased this table to put a microwave oven on. It has no support for the table top in the center/middle, so it now it is sagging and we cannot open the door to the microwave oven unless we set it right on the edge of the table top.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: They'll do
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived and unboxed. Great tables. Only thing I would like is a 'Made in America' option. These are made in China. I know they'll stand up to time and abuse but would rather see Americans working and producing. 4 stars for those reasons.
customer_reviews.author: Cross U

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-made, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Really glad I bought this table to store heavy containers. It's exceptionally sturdy and well-made, even good-looking. Delivery was fast. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Gal

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, look expensive
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and put them against the back wall of my den/office. The grey color actually looks very nice with all my computer related items on top which are mostly black. The tables are sturdy and look well made which gives them a classier vibe. (Sorry, couldn't think of another way to describe). They do work well with the light wood desk and bookcase. On the minus side, both came with a small dimple on the edge. But I just turned them to the wall side. All in all, I am Very Happy with these tables and would buy again at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah22

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great tables! They are just what I needed for my craft shows. It is difficult finding 5-foot tables locally unless they have the hinge that allows you to fold them in half and that compromises the strength and stability and they start sagging in the middle. These tables are exactly what I was looking for and they worked like a charm and clean up easily if necessary. The price was very reasonable too as I shopped and compared prices before settling on these two.
customer_reviews.author: PAW

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and right height
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a well build table. I could not wish for better. Strong and there is no wiggle in this. Using it as sewing table and the right height to reach my sewing machine (no bending or twisting) and very comfortable to sit at with a regular wooden chair. I am glad i decided on this table. I am able to set out patterns and room for sewing items needed when quilting.
customer_reviews.author: HILTON

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and works well! Easy to set up and put away. My only wish was that it folded in half for easier storage, but that might've taken away from some of its sturdiness. Would recommend to friends and family. We always use this table when guests are over as an appetizer station. We have an empty wall in our kitchen and this table fits against it perfectly. Throw a tablecloth on and you're good to go. Every household should have one.
customer_reviews.author: onefastricerocket

customer_reviews.title: Super Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the best plastic tables! I have two that I use as a desk/work bench. They are super sturdy, and don't wobble or flex at all! Even my dad was impressed with them! I have been using them for well over a year now, and have never had any problems with them!
customer_reviews.author: Fred J. K.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and light
customer_reviews.text: Excellent table, very light but incredibly sturdy. Love it after 3 years use. Some small shipping dents in top, but this has not compromised its integrity.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: My vanilla bean ice cream table
customer_reviews.text: Best price, looked at other desks, worked at a non profit area where we would use tons of these, This is more sleek than the lifetime,color is a little on the funky grey side, but who cares, does the job, i put my desktop on it, and it is sturdy, i like the little speckles of dots, reminds me of vanilla bean ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Soo.K

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't wobble, very sturdy, can set this up and break it down by myself
customer_reviews.text: Using this table for crafts. I've got lots of space. Sitting down I can't even reach the farthest parts of the corners. I'm about 5'2", adult female, and I can set this up and break it down by myself. Not heavy, but just a bit awkward. Doesn't wobble, very sturdy, wouldn't trade it for anything. Great table for the price, others can be quite expensive don't you think? The top is like a light grainy texture, not a smooth silky surface.
customer_reviews.author: Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy tables
customer_reviews.text: This is a reorder item, we are replacing some of our 6' tables with these 5' tables. There are sturdy and easy to move around, plus with the elimination of the 1' on each table it gives us more room to move around. We lose some table space but with the extra room we can put more tables down and gain that back easily. We will be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: William Laughlin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and value
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy,easy to set up,easily cleaned top,reasonable price.Standard height.Rounded corners.i like this table a lot more than the one at Staples for $15 more.
customer_reviews.author: offtheback

customer_reviews.title: ... awaiting amazon for results but this is a very nice table and would serve many purposes excellently
customer_reviews.text: Dinged on one side and awaiting amazon for results but this is a very nice table and would serve many purposes excellently. Funny how the out for delivery boxing is poor and when I opened (was ripped in few places) the rest up was surprised at the great add on corner pieces. Funny how my table had damage but the corner put on was 100% fine. Quality control on this was horrible at the factory or where this unit was boxed more specifically.
customer_reviews.author: Big Joe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be fine so far and I bought three of these. One looks like there might be a very slight sag in the middle but nothing else. It does have the logo on the top of the ends but for me that is not a problem. It might be for someone that might write or draw. The legs fold up nicely into the molded table and stayed there. Make that 4 1/2 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Noble

customer_reviews.title: Came with damaged on one corner.
customer_reviews.text: I needed this table quickly. It was the perfect size, but one corner was damaged. Had to have it, but not happy with damaged table.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Good but with a small defect
customer_reviews.text: It arrives with a dent in a corner. I was too lazy to return it. Otherwise it's a good workstation. Stable and spacious.
customer_reviews.author: Xiangyu Yin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a gaming setup
customer_reviews.text: I have two 23 inch screens, a large mouse mat, usb controller, headphones, router & modem all on this desk. This thing is perfect if you're a gamer. I don't see anything wrong with it, and so far I'm liking it a lot. My previous plastic desk had a fold in the middle that set anything off-balance if you put it near the fold, and this is the perfect replacement. For anyone curious, the folding legs are held apart via a little metal ring you just slide down. Nothing bad to say, it is what it is.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This table is designed for heavy duty operations. It is well made and built to last.
customer_reviews.author: Beepie

customer_reviews.title: Top can sag a small amount with heavy items. Sturdy, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I put some old heavy 20" glass monitors on it. The top layer of plastic sags a small amount until it meets the bottom layer of plastic. So a monitor near one end tilts toward the center. Very sturdy tables and easy to operate. Can sit on it / plop heavy boxes on it without worry.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R

customer_reviews.title: Saves your back and just as sturdy as wook
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for the volunteer fire department, as us older people often get stuck carrying the old bulking heavy tables up and down the stairs. These are super light weight, yet are extremely sturdy. You can easily carry 2 of these at once. There are built in center handles where the legs collapse to help carry these while balancing the weight. We are purchasing more of these shortly, out with the heavy wood tables!
customer_reviews.author: Mtn_Retreat

customer_reviews.title: Either table was crushed in transit or quality control is bad at the factory
customer_reviews.text: Just received this table an hour ago. Two star rating because the table is damaged (one of the corners on top was crushed). Also missing a piece of plastic that holds one of the legs in place underneath the table. Either table was crushed in transit or quality control is bad at the factory. Otherwise, table does appear to be pretty sturdy. Thank goodness I can return this item (90 bucks with tax).
customer_reviews.author: Hercules

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, portable, and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what we needed in our new pole barn party room. Sturdy, gray, and folds up to store out of way when needed. Arrived on time as stated. We actually purchased two of them, other is used for table outside RV under awning. It is big enough for tv, and the dinner time buffet. Easily wiped clean, and no black marks left like the white ones.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara M.

customer_reviews.title: Bows with not much on it
customer_reviews.text: I've had mine about 2 months. During this time it has held a 21-inch monitor on one end (along the edge), a desktop computer tower on the other edge, and a 21-inch monitor and keyboard in the middle. The table already bows/curved downward in the middle and it's very noticeable. I'm hoping the thing won't collapse.
customer_reviews.author: Horror movie buff

customer_reviews.title: You can't go wrong, order this table!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic table for the price! WOW! I just ordered a second one to keep in the event I need it. Never can have too many NICE, STURDY, folding tables. This table is REALLY sturdy for the price. You will NOT be sorry if you order one. The table is solid, doesn't fold, which I like since a fold never sets smoothly. The legs are sturdy and easy to open, close. My kitchen is currently being remodeled and this is holding items moved from the counters. Amazingly it holds a lot and the weight limit helps.
customer_reviews.author: Shesinstpete33710

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this table to put my Precious Moments Sugar Town Collection on through the Holidays. This is the first season we have used the table and I am completely confident that my ceramic collection is safe! The table is pretty sturdy and seems to be well made. The legs are made out of metal and each side has a gravity style latch lock to make sure the legs won't collapse. The top is made of plastic and the color is light gray. This has suited my needs completely.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie CollinsTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Dent
customer_reviews.text: The table itself is fine and would be everything I expected IF it did not have a dent. The table was obviously damaged during transport. It is usable and I do not have time to return and replace it (I need it for a large dinner right now). However, it will be difficult to cover the dent.
customer_reviews.author: doglover

customer_reviews.title: Great Strong all around Table with Fast shipping !
customer_reviews.text: This Table has been awesome! we even ended up buying a second table right after the first one arrived and we set it up . We used it on our farm for Processing our meat and they have worked great! They are sturdy , Simple to set up and clean , Perfect size for multiple people to use at once and easy to store when finished with them ! I would recommend these to anyone needing a good strong table with a good price !
customer_reviews.author: Megan Messer

customer_reviews.title: Nice table - use it often
customer_reviews.text: My home is too small to leave a permanent table set up for the occasional 'Sunday Dinner at Moms' - this stores and sets up easily and once you have a table cloth and food on it .. it's all good. I wish I'd paid more attention and ordered the next larger size - but we can comfortably set 6 people at it although the end users have to watch their knees. Light enough to carry and fortunately no one has tried to sit on it yet - not sure if it would sustain that weight. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LuvtoShopAmazon

customer_reviews.title: smart buy
customer_reviews.text: Needed a wider table to use as study/office desk. This works great. I would like it even more if the top surface was smooth. But this table is light weight, easy to stow away and sturdy enough for books/lap top. Very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor college student's desk
customer_reviews.text: I use this table as a desk. I like having a lot of space to work, and finding a 'real' desk this large would be $200+. It is NOT that weird texture most folding tables have. Table can hold a lot of weight. Again, it's really nice that I can throw so much on my 'desk' and spread out all of my books and papers. Possible con is that the table does not fold in half, but that's irrelevant for me. I got what I needed at at least 1/4th the price.
customer_reviews.author: ericaamy

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly better than expected...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the smallest version of this table..a little under $50 I believe, for arts & crafts but mainly as a primary work desk for my home business. Surprisingly even with a hp all in one key printer, an external fan, a hp 17" laptop and a plethora of work nicnacs(pens folders clips etc) I found my self surprised by how much room I still have to work. Side note I'm an Accountant.
customer_reviews.author: PrettyProphet

customer_reviews.title: Sagging Center...Terrible
customer_reviews.text: If you don’t mind a center sagged table, then this table is great. I, personally, am very disappointed. I purchased for the strength and weight capacity but didn’t expect that it was sagged so badly! I added a straight board on the back and shimmed the front. Still not perfect but will do.
customer_reviews.author: JoJoB

customer_reviews.title: As a carpenter I use tables like this one every day in my work
customer_reviews.text: As a carpenter I use tables like this one every day in my work, So far this is the strongest and best built table I have ever bought. I like the fact that it does not fold in the middle, folding tables always feel a little rickety and flimsy to me. For the size and quality I would say this is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: James Hansen

customer_reviews.title: It is very sturdy and just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I use this table for a craft table. It is very sturdy and just the right size. I can have four people sit around it to craft at a time comfortably and can add two more people at the ends if I have to. It is a tab high for crafting, but if you have an ergonomic adjusting chair, you can adjust the height of the chair. I put a small pillow in the seat of my non-adustable chair and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mellomoon

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent table which I am using for my printer
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent table which I am using for my printer, computer and more. I had been thinking of buying one of those computer desks make out of compressed wood scraps but those things are so heavy. The prospect of having to move one of them in the future made me decide against them. This table folds up very easily, is very sturdy, and looks nice. It is an excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Maine BoyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy again
customer_reviews.text: These were exactly what I wanted. I didn't want tables that folded in the middle because of issues people always seem to have with those. I bought these to use in my garage when working on projects so I wasn't really worried about a ding here or there, but would have no issues with using them at a get together where more tables are needed. I can put them up and fold to store by myself with no problems. I'd buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh Ann Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Great Value !
customer_reviews.text: Very Sturdy Table. Great for crafting etc. I bought 2 of these for my sons as they both are now using them for computer tables. The folding mechanism works flawlessly and the coating on the table has no imperfections (some tables of this kind have large bumps in them). The color is a nice neutral light grey that goes with just about any decor.
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE DELBALSO

customer_reviews.title: great table
customer_reviews.text: I honestly love this table, it's strong and not too heavy , long enough to put all my media stuff, since I purchase two the other one will be use to set up my video editing laptop and camera equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Reyes

customer_reviews.title: bowed
customer_reviews.text: Not a strong table. I put two light computers on it (CPU built into the monitor) near both ends and either the table was already bowed in the middle or just that tiny bit of weight did it. Either way, it looks like an old pack mule now.
customer_reviews.author: L. Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for holding my plant trays and grow lights. Easy to move, fold and store, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: orchdldy

customer_reviews.title: Om
customer_reviews.text: I was initially disappointed with how light and cheap it felt out of the box, but did a closer inspection of the folding tables I was comparing it to in my mind and those other tables weren't as thick or heavy As I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Dudesville

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy heavy table. Worth buying if you're looking to put something heavy on it. I'm using it as my temporary office table until I save up to buy a proper one but I've got everything on it including laptop, printer and my lightbox. The top is a light grey with small black flecks not white but that didn't bother me as I still thought it went with everything I had.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne J

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLE PURE VALUE
customer_reviews.text: Almost unbelievable performance. The design and materials used make this one durable table able to withstand the rigors of daily use. Set up and tear down are easy too. You can do a jig on one of these without fear of collapse. Very sturdy table. Well made. Highly recommend. A real gem
customer_reviews.author: CHIRPER

customer_reviews.title: Set the Table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table. Sturdy, lots of room to work. I have not experienced any drooping issues others have talked about. Good priced table. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee man

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but lightweight table for those big family get togethers
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy but lightweight table for those big family get togethers. Table is well made but NOT for standing on. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: The Raven Summons

product_meta.title: National Public Seating NPS 30" x 72" Heavy Duty Folding Table, Speckled Gray, 1,000 lb Capacity (BT3072)
product_meta.description:
Size:30" X 72"

 The National Public Seating BT3000 Series steel frame rectangular blow molded plastic top folding table has a speckled gray, 72" long, 1-3/4" thick, UV protected, blow molded plastic table top, a steel frame that can support 1,000 lb. of evenly distributed weight, and folds for compact storage when not in use. The blow molded plastic top has a better strength-to-weight ratio than solid plastic or wood tables, is UV protected to withstand sunlight during outdoor use, and can withstand heat up to 212 degrees F so it won't be damaged by hot plates or coffee cups. The surface is lightly textured to increase scratch resistance, but is still smooth enough to write on. The gray steel legs are powder coated for corrosion resistance. When the legs are opened, gravity lock rings engage to keep table legs open when upright, and slide out of the way for folding. When folded, the legs nest flush into indentations in the bottom of the table, making a flat surface suitable for stacking multiple tables for compact storage. Plastic glides on the feet help protect floor surfaces. 

 The table is Materials Analytical Services (MAS) certified as low volatile organic compound (VOC) emitting furniture according to the criteria defined by U.S. Green Building Council (USGBC) Leadership in Energy & Environmental Design (LEED) 2009 for Schools, LEED 2009 for Commercial Interiors, ANSI/BIFMA X7.1-2011, ANSI/BIFMA e3-2011e Furniture Sustainability Standard - Section 7.6.1 and 7.6.2, Collaborative for High Performance Schools (CHPS) EQ2.2.5, and the MAS Certified Green program. This table meets the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990 (ADA) Standards for Accessible Design. 

SPECIFICATIONS
Overall dimensions, open29-1/2 x 72 x 30 inches (H x W x D)Weight supported1,000 lb.Frame material17 gauge steelLeg material18 gauge steelWeight35 lb.
(H is height, the vertical distance from lowest to highest point; W is width, the horizontal distance from left to right; D is depth, the horizontal distance from front to back.)

 National Public Seating manufactures furniture and associated transport and storage accessories for educational, worship, hospitality, food service, and other institutional venues. The company, founded in 1997, is headquartered in Clifton, NJ.
feature_bullets: 72" long rectangular plastic folding table with steel frame for temporary placement and compact storage when not in use
Gravity locks keep table legs open when upright, and slide out of the way for folding
Speckled gray blow molded plastic table top is 1-3/4" thick, can withstand heat up to 212 degrees F, and is UV protected to withstand sunlight during outdoor use
17 gauge steel frame, with 18 gauge steel legs, supports 1,000 lb. of evenly distributed weight
Folded legs nest flush into table, making a flat surface suitable for stacking for compact storage

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
